title: Business Meeting
list: Should I write down every word that everyone says?
Would you please check on the availability of the conference room for that day?
I am trying to arrange a meeting for this week.
Is the room ready for the conference?
Let's set the meeting up at eight o'clock on monday morning.
How about the microphone and speakers?
I want to know if everything is going well for tomorrow's meeting.
You get the computer and projector ready.
I hope that you prepare a short speech for the meeting.
Did you inform her of the meeting time?
Could you please call and remind the attendees?
I will send meeting notice to the different departments.
Please draft a notice for the meeting.
Please inform them about the meeting location.
Let's write a notice of the meeting for next monday.
Please notify the relevant section chiefs.
We are used to phone or email notification.
The meeting in the afternoon will be held in the conference room.
All the members received duplicated notices of the meeting.
I've got the notice of the meeting already.
Why were you absent this afternoon?
Could you tell me the reason why you were absent from the meeting?
You killed further discussion with your absence.
You get demerits if you Miss a meeting.
We will hold a meeting this afternoon. Please attend it on time.
All of us were guessing why our manager was absent from this important meeting.
The committee demands that no member would be absent.
No one believes the reason that he gave us about his absence at the meeting.
The people absent must make up for the meeting.
The meeting had to be put off due to his absence.
He is always absent from the meeting.
Anyone who absence from the meeting will be fined.
He is always looking for excuses to be absent from the meeting.
He comes to meetings on time, every time.
Some staff are absent today.
He absented himself from a meeting yesterday.
He is conspicuously not present at the meeting.
His absence puts off the meeting.
Would you like to sit in on the meeting?
May I sit in on it?
Do you mind if I sit in on the meeting?
How long did you sit in on the meeting?
What do you learn by sitting in on the meeting?
Please invite all our clients to the conference next week.
Please print out the meeting agenda for me to look over.
Please print out the meeting agenda for me to look over.
At every meeting, the Chairman will sit in on the meeting.
He also gave some useful advices when he was sitting in on the meeting.
The manager agrees his requirements of sitting in on the meeting.
I will be observing today.
Who is responsible for writing the meeting minutes?
Could you please give everyone a copy of the meeting minutes?
Could you make the minutes in both Chinese and English?
Will you take minutes at the meeting in the afternoon?
To make a record of the meeting is very important.
Let's review the minutes from last meeting.
I have read through the minutes of the last meeting.
You should appoint a secretary to take meeting notes.
I have to take minutes of every meeting.
You must learn how to take minutes.
Let's go to the next topic.
We will now proceed to the panel discussion.
Does anyone have anything to add?
I hope that everyone participates in today's discussion.
I would like to get everyone's opinion on the issue.
Now let's come to the final issue.
Let me deal with the differences first.
May we have your opinion?
I'm afraid I can't agree with you.
Do we have a meeting agenda?
Is there a meeting agenda?
Let's discuss the meeting agenda in detail first.
Do you think it necessary to add this item to the agenda?
I will send the meeting agenda for your reference.
Let's go through the agenda quickly.
Let's proceed to the next item on the agenda.
If there is no objection, the agenda is adopted.
There are some changes in the meeting agenda, so I have to redo this.
The next step will be to draw up a meeting agenda.
The meeting agenda should be clear.
There are altogether three items on the agenda.
Issues to be discussed on the agenda include five aspects.
Are there any other issues that we need to discuss today?

When will we have the next meeting?

We have to finish today's discussion now.
Let's discuss it in more detail tomorrow.
Before we close, let me summarize the main point.
If nobody wants to add anything, we can draw the meeting to a close.
All scheduled programs have been completed.
Thank you for your participation.
If there is nothing else, the meeting is finished.
Please give further attention to the topics we have discussed today.
I would like to end this meeting now.
Let's call it a day, shall we?
What's the reason of canceling the meeting?
Why not cancel the meeting?
We could put off the meeting or cancel it.
I prefer to call off the meeting on account of boss's absence.
They would be very reluctant to postpone or cancel the meeting.
We had to put the meeting off since so many people were absent.
Our boss called to cancel the meeting.

Should we wear our badges at all times?

Please paste up these posters on the walls in the surrounding hallways.
All exhibits should be ready by the opening hour of the exhibition.

I'm sure we can arrange it before then.
We have to order a glass display counter.

This is our newest invention.
This product is the result of our latest technology.

I'm really glad to introduce our new product.
Our product is sure to win out over all those of our competitors.

This is a revolutionary new product.
